articles.description: A show rep said the veteran entertainer 'will be making a surprise guest appearance on Monday's show, in support of the competing couples who will dance to the music from her iconic film role.'
articles.content:
Olivia Newton-John is set to make a special cameo appearance on Dancing with the Stars Monday for the ABC show's Grease-themed episode.
A show rep told E! News that the veteran entertainer, 73, 'wil… [+1965 chars]
